title: Allison Shatters the Looking-Glass
description: This is book 3 in the Harem of Hearts series. Will Allison ever get home? Or would she rather have a harem of gorgeous men in Underland?  This is a full-length novel with #whychoose as the theme meaning Alli will find her HEA with more than one man--more like nine.  *FULL BLURB COMING SOON!*
author: C.M. Stunich
